page.title: 13New Industry - YKK
page.content:
As well as Bass (see page 12) coming to the area,{YKK}have built a factory. YKK is a{Japanese}company making{zips.
The factory is run on{'Japanese {lines'.} As this was one of the first factories in Britain to be run on these lines it received a lot of publicity when it opened.
Among the Japanese 'innovations' at the factory is the one canteen for workers and management alike.
One of the incentives for the workers is a{trip to Japan. }A list of efficient workers is made by the management. The workers themselves then vote on who deserves to be given such a trip
